solution_line_template: Meso types {meso_pages_typed} pages / {meso_time_taken} minutes = <<{meso_pages_typed}/{meso_time_taken}={meso_rate}>>{meso_rate} page per minute.
Tyler types {tyler_pages_typed} pages / {tyler_time_taken} minutes = <<{tyler_pages_typed}/{tyler_time_taken}={tyler_rate}>>{tyler_rate} pages per minute.
Together they can type {meso_rate} + {tyler_rate} = <<{meso_rate}+{tyler_rate}={combined_rate}>>{combined_rate} pages per minute.
Working together, it would take them {target_pages} pages / {combined_rate} pages per minute = <<{target_pages}/{combined_rate}={time_together}>>{time_together} minutes
